articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim, premier of the DPRK, acquainted himself with the production and technological  updating at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex on the spot on Mar. 16.
					The complex, which plays an important role in developing the metal industry of the country, is alive with a high-pitched drive to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and greet the conference of the Workers' Party of Korea with high political zeal and great labor successes.
					
					The workers of the complex carried out the first phase technological updating of the curved type strand-casting machine on a high level and successfully introduced a device for making up for reactive power.
					
					They are technologically updating the heating process of the hot rolling production while ensuring a full capacity operation of furnace No. 2.
					
					Making the rounds of various places of the complex including blast furnaces Nos. 2 and 3 under overhaul, Choe encouraged the workers in their labor drive.
					
					Choe held a consultative meeting with officials concerned on the spot.
					
					The meeting reviewed the work done for implementing the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il and steel production and the supply of raw materials and fuel to ensure the continuous operation of the blast furnace.
					
					It also discussed working measures to settle the issues arising in satisfactorily supplying electricity and giving priority to the provision of raw materials and fuel to production processes and closely combining production with science and technology.
					
					It took measures to properly work out a plan for production and supply and realize the overall technological updating of the hot and cold rolling production processes.

articles.title: Spring Tree-planting Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Tree-planting Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Spring tree-planting is brisk in the DPRK. 
					Officials in the field of land and environmental conservation deeply explain the working people the significance and importance of afforestation. As a result, spring tree-planting is now under way as a mass movement. 
					
					North Hwanghae Province worked out a plan to plant more than a hundred million trees of good species in spring and its people are out in the tree-planting campaign.
					
					People in Yangdok, Phyongwon, Songchon and Sinyang counties of South Phyongan Province are overfulfilling their daily quotas with a goal to plant trees of good species in hundreds of hectares of land. 
					
					Signal successes in tree-planting are reported from Unryul, Jaeryong and Sinchon counties of South Hwanghae Province. 
					
					The areas under saplings are increasing as the days go by thanks to the devoted efforts of officials, working people and school youth and children in North Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces.

articles.title: Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 Is Legitimate Right of DPRK: KCNA
articles.content:
Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-3 Is Legitimate Right of DPRK: KCNA
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Some forces are letting loose a spate of gossip as regards the launch of Kwangmyongsong-3, an earth observation satellite manufactured by the DPRK by its own efforts and with its indigenous technology. 
					The hostile forces including the U.S., Japan and south Korea let loose outbursts that it will be a "missile launch", "a serious provocative act of threatening the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia" and "a violation of the UNSC 'resolution'."
					
					This is, in a nutshell, a base move to deny the DPRK's right to use space for peaceful purposes and encroach upon its sovereignty as it is typical of the hostile policy toward it.
					
					The peaceful development and use of space is a universally recognized legitimate right of a sovereign state. The satellite launch for scientific researches into the peaceful development and use of space and economic development can by no means be a monopoly of specified countries.
					
					As a matter of fact, many countries and regions of the world are deepening scientific researches in the use of outer space and putting them into practice at present, the age of latest science and technology. 
					
					Growing strong with each passing day is the international trend of energetically pushing forward the manufacture and launch of satellites and joining in it.
					
					The DPRK's satellite launch is a matter pertaining to the sovereignty of the sovereign state.  
					
					As the DPRK has already clarified, Kwangmyogsong-3 is a precious result of scientific researches conducted by scientists and technicians of the DPRK in order to develop and utilize working satellites indispensable for the country's economic development, pursuant to the government's policy for the peaceful development and use of space.
					
					When the DPRK launched two experimental satellites, it strictly abided by relevant international regulations and practice. 
					
					As regards the projected launch of the working satellite, the DPRK sent necessary information to the relevant international bodies according to international regulations and procedures and expressed the will to invite experts and journalists of other countries to view the launching station. 
					
					This being a hard reality, the hostile forces are vying with each other to find fault with the DPRK's projected legitimate satellite launch. This is a move to step up their hostile policy towards the DPRK as it is a sinister and deliberate anti-peace action aimed at provocations. 
					
					Moreover, the U.S., Japan and south Korea have neither justification nor face to talk about someone's satellite launch. 
					
					It is the U.S. that is hell-bent on espionage against sovereign states with the help of so many spy satellites in the space. Japan is rushing headlong into launching spy satellites and establishing its own system of space espionage, dreaming of a military giant. South Korea was shameful to have failed twice in its attempt to launch a satellite entirely with other's help. South Korea has neither justification nor face to chide someone's satellite launch. 
					
					The hostile forces are persistently insisting that the DPRK's satellite launches are "missile threats" and "provocations" because they consider its dignity, might and scientific progress as a thorn in their flesh.
					
					Explicitly speaking, no one can tolerate the double yardstick and double standards in the issue of satellite manufacture and launch. 
					
					The hostile forces are sadly mistaken if they think the DPRK will cancel the already projected satellite launch due to some forces' accusations over the above-said matter.
					
					Intolerable are the dastardly acts to use the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes as a lever for political, military and economic pressure upon it.
					
					No one has the right to take issue with the DPRK's projected satellite launch this or that way.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Warmongers' Drumbeats of War
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Warmongers' Drumbeats of War
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean Minister of Defense Kim Kwan Jin and Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Jong Sung Jo are arch criminals who created the worst phase of confrontation in history by daring hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the nation. They are now making their last-ditch efforts to get rid of their predicament. 
					On March 16, Kim Kwan Jin, referring to photos and defamatory slogans displayed at units of the puppet army, blustered that "he felt no need to instruct to remove them. They may keep them as they are if they feel necessary to firmly maintain a viewpoint on the enemy".
					
					He went as far as to Yonphyong Island and ordered "battalion commander and regimental commander to immediately react to the north's provocation even in the absence of his resolution" and "take even a ten-fold retaliation".
					
					Jong Sung Jo incited malignant hostility for confrontation while flying in the air over Yonphyong Island aboard F-15K fighter on March 15, not content with crying out for "meting out a thousand-fold punishment, considering it as an opportunity for taking revenge".
					
					The military gangsters who masterminded the hideous provocations are going reckless, describing the DPRK's just sacred war as a "smear" and "protest campaign."
					
					This resulted in reinforcing the resolution of the army and people of the DPRK to take revenge upon the enemies in order to protect the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					It is the irresistible mind-set of the people and the requirement of history to clear this land of those arch criminals as early as possible.
					
					The group of traitors has no way out.
					
					What this dirty group prattled is nothing but a fit in despair and bluffing of the doomed.
					
					The group of traitors fated to face a stern judgment of history for its monstrous crimes against ethics and the nation is the primary targets of our precision strikes.
					
					A final showdown is about to take place.
					
					The Korean-style sacred war will make a clean sweep of the above-said traitors and help the nation settle its pent-up grudge without fail.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Fail: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Fail: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. policy of confrontation with the DPRK is bound to fail, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article. 
					Noting that a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the reckless anti-DPRK war moves of the U.S. and south Korean warmongers, the article goes on:
					
					What the U.S. seeks is the escalated tension and danger of war on the peninsula. That was why whenever there was an atmosphere of detente and reunification on the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. used to egg the south Korean puppet forces on to cook up unexpected incidents in an effort to chill that atmosphere and strain the situation.
					
					The peninsula has never been in a peace due to the military rackets of the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					Escalating tension on the peninsula will not be beneficial to the U.S. but will only be a factor of precipitating its destruction. 
					
					The U.S. attaches importance to the peninsula because it is a strategic vantage point. The U.S. seeks to keep and reinforce its political and military supremacy in Northeast Asia where big powers are concentrated. This ambition is pushing the U.S. to a cliff. Gloomy is the prospect of the U.S. tightening the alliance with the south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries obsessed with the ambition for world supremacy, failing to know where it stands. 
					
					The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is a dangerous and anachronistic policy driving it to an abyss of ruin.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that the joint military exercises and war moves intensified by it in south Korea are leading the U.S. economy and politics to a bottomless pitfall.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Warmonger's Hysteria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Warmonger's Hysteria
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Jong Sung Jo, chairman of the south Korean puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff, appeared at the airforce operational command in Phyongthaek of south Korea where he cried out for "making immediate sorties and dealing precision blows at the bases of provocation and their supporting forces if the north provokes". He flew over waters of the West Sea of Korea for one hour aboard an F-15K fighter. 
					Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					This is nothing but hysteria of a warmonger on deathbed. 
					
					Jong Sung Jo is second to none in bellicose nature. 
					
					What he agitated was a total war against the DPRK. This heinous warmonger openly betrayed his adventurous scenario to spark a grave armed conflict against the DPRK through a deliberate provocation and escalate it into a total war. He is so dangerous that he should be finished off before it is too late.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors can never evade its responsibility for its hideous acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Korean nation. The nation can never allow this group to go scot-free as it has desperately challenged the nation instead of making repentance or apology for its thrice-cursed crimes committed against history and the nation.
					
					The puppet forces are now going reckless in a bid to get rid of their abyss of ruin but this will not save them from their miserable fate.
					
					The day is not far off when Jong Sung Jo will lament over the fact that his reckless hysteria resulted in precipitating his doom.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating S. Korean Conservative Ruling Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating S. Korean Conservative Ruling Forces
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative ruling forces are a stumbling block in carving out the independent destiny of the Korean nation, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a bylined article.
					It goes on:
					
					The conservative group has seriously infringed upon the destiny and interests of the nation, giving priority to foreign forces and kowtowing to them. The Lee Myung Bak regime's policy of dependence on foreign forces is vividly illustrated by the fact that they openly declared that they would deal with the north-south relations within the framework of the tightened "alliance" with foreign forces.
					
					All Koreans keenly felt over the last four years that the Lee group is a horde of traitors with whom they cannot live under the same sky and it is the only way out for the Korean nation to wipe them out as early as possible.
					
					The Koreans are sure to emerge victorious in the struggle for national reunification as long as there are the Three Charters for National Reunification and the north-south joint declaration, the landmarks of independent reunification, peace and prosperity, and the pro-reunification patriotic driving force which has carried forward the tradition of national unity. 
					
					The Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should pave the way for carving out the independent destiny full of confidence, united close in the spirit of "By the Korean nation itself" with the high pride and honor of being the members of Kim Il Sung's nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Setting Fire to "American Cultural Service" Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Setting Fire to "American Cultural Service" Marked
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean youths, students and other people set fire to the "American Cultural Service" in Pusan on March 18, 1982, and waged a brave anti-U.S. struggle, scattering leaflets "U.S. go out!" and "No American neocolonialism!"
					Newspapers on Sunday dedicate bylined articles to the anniversary.
					
					They say that setting fire to the Pusan "American Cultural Service" recorded a shining page in the history of anti-U.S. struggle for independence as it was demonstration of the will to win back the sovereignty of the nation and achieve the reunification of the country. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun says: 
					
					Three decades have passed since then, but the desire of the south Korean people for sovereignty has not yet come true. 
					
					The south Korean puppet ruling quarters are guides for the U.S. permanent presence and domination over south Korea. The successive ruling quarters of south Korea have worked hard to stay in power and escalate confrontation with the compatriots in the north while selling out the dignity and interests of the nation, clinging to the coattail of the U.S., bereft of national self-esteem. 
					
					The revival of fascist dictatorial system and deterioration of the economy and people's living which arouse deep concern in south Korea are entirely due to the pro-U.S. sycophantic and traitorous policy of the conservative group. It is the Lee Myung Bak regime that asked the U.S. to postpone the "transfer of the right to wartime operational command" and not abandon the regime, persistently opposed to the reduction of the U.S. forces in south Korea in a bid to turn south Korea into a permanent colony of the U.S.
					
					The Lee group is getting frantic with the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, slandering the idea of "By our nation itself", the idea guiding the era of independent reunification, in violation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. This is a reckless act of toeing the U.S. policy of aggression toward the DPRK. 
					
					Minju Joson calls upon the south Korean people to turn out in actions in the same spirit as what they displayed when setting fire to the cursed "American Cultural Service" in Pusan 30 years ago and drive the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea as early as possible and severely punish the Lee group of traitors.

articles.title: Korean Youth Praised by Regional Organization
articles.content:
Korean Youth Praised by Regional Organization
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted an article titled "Love the young people" on an internet homepage on March 12.
					The article said more than 1.2 million young people of the DPRK vowed to devote their lives to defending their beloved country and more than 3 million of them proceeded to major worksites after forming as many as 10 thousand shock brigades late last year when the nation suffered a big loss.
					
					These are the actions taken by the young Koreans to live up to the profound love and trust leader Kim Jong Il showed for them by putting forward them as vanguard and shock brigade for building a thriving nation, regarding the issue of them as an important one related to the future destiny of the country, it noted, adding:
					
					Kim Jong Il put up slogan "Love the young people", pleased more than anyone else with what they have done, and gave the word "youth" to the names of the structures built by them.
					
					The young people in the DPRK loved and trusted by Kim Jong Il are now dynamically bearing the brunt of every difficult and labor-consuming project for building a thriving nation, united closer around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Economic Achievements Introduced by Chinese Paper
articles.content:
DPRK's Economic Achievements Introduced by Chinese Paper
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Chinese paper Cankao Xiaoxi on March 14 carried an article titled "DPRK greets centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung in new spirit".
					The army and people of the DPRK deeply grieving over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il are dynamically speeding up the grand march for building a thriving nation true to his behests, the paper said.
					
					Everything in the DPRK is now oriented to the commemorations of the centenary of birth of the President, it noted.
					
					A street peculiar to Korea in which the formative art and peculiar layout of a park have been applied at the best level is now under construction in Mansudae area of Pyongyang, it said, adding modern apartment houses and a theatre look magnificent.
					
					A ceremony of unveiling the equestrian statues of the President and Kim Jong Il was held with splendor at the Mansudae Art Studio in February, it said, and continued:
					
					Miracles and innovations are taking place in all fields of economic construction as evidenced by the construction of the Huichon Power Station and the Tanchon Port project progressing at a final phase and the mass-production of vinalon and fertilizers with materials and fuel available in the country.
					
					It also introduced the construction of a series of production, service and cultural centers for improving the standard of people's living including the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, the Pothonggang Aquatic Products Shop and the construction of the Pyongyang Folk Park.

articles.title: Russian Political Party, Nepali Organizations Concerned over Worsening Situation in Korea
articles.content:
Russian Political Party, Nepali Organizations Concerned over Worsening Situation in Korea
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A Russian political party and Nepali organizations made public statements on March 12 as regards the worsening situation on the Korean Peninsula. 
					The Executive Committee of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia in its statement said the U.S. and south Korean authorities have perpetrated ceaseless large-scale military provocations which may threaten the very existence of the world despite of the DPRK's various peace initiatives including the issue of denuclearizing the peninsula. 
					
					The U.S. and its stooges' anti-DPRK provocations can never be tolerated, it said, calling upon the UN and world progressives to support the constructive proposals of the DPRK for protecting its sovereignty and defending peace in the region. 
					
					The Nepali Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea, the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal and the Nepali Association for Supporting the Songun Politics in a joint statement expressed serious concern over the situation in the peninsula reaching the brink of war due to the U.S. and south Korean warlike forces' large joint military exercises for invading the DPRK. 
					
					The statement urged the U.S. and south Korean authorities to stop at once the joint military exercises and solve the pending problems of the peninsula by peaceful means.

articles.title: Jordanian Students Call for Expelling Israel Ambassador
articles.content:
Jordanian Students Call for Expelling Israel Ambassador
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of Jordanian students in University of Jordan on Thursday called for expelling the Israeli ambassador from Amman over the violence in the Gaza Strip.
					They condemned Israel for its recent attacks against the Gaza Strip that led to the death and injury of many Palestinians.

articles.title: Projected Launch of Working Satellite Hailed
articles.content:
Projected Launch of Working Satellite Hailed
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news that the DPRK will launch a working satellite, officials of the Ministry of Post and Telecommunications and the Hydro-Meteorological Service expressed their will to devote themselves to building a thriving nation, noting that the launch is a significant event bringing earlier the prosperity of Juche Korea. 
					O Hi Dok, vice-minister of Post and Telecommunications, said thanks to the patriotic devotion of leader Kim Jong Il the space technology of the DPRK has reached a high stage and a scientific and technological foundation has been laid for launching the above-said satellite. 
					
					Hwang Chol Phung, a department director of the ministry, said the satellite launch will fully demonstrate the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea. He expressed the will to devote all his enthusiasm to steadily developing the communication technology and updating equipment and operation means as required by the Songun era. 
					
					Ryu Pong Chol, vice-director of the Hydro-Meteorological Service, said a working satellite successfully manufactured according to the DPRK's policy of space development and its peaceful use is expected to be launched on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, adding that this will be a great auspicious event to be conveyed to posterity along with the nation's history of prosperity. 
					
					Sim Myong Ok, vice-director of the Central Meteorological Research Institute, and Kim Tae Il, a section chief of the Hydro-metrology Marine Information and Communication Centre, sent warm congratulations to the scientists and technicians for having achieved leaping progress in the field of space science and technology and established a firm foundation for launching the working satellite and its normal operation. 
					
					Sim and Kim vowed to learn from the ardent creative spirit and patriotic devotion displayed by them and register greater successes in putting the receiving equipment of the meteorological satellite on a Juche-oriented basis and thus make a positive contribution to the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Nearly Five Million Yemenis Need Food Assistance: UN Survey
articles.content:
Nearly Five Million Yemenis Need Food Assistance: UN Survey
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Almost five million Yemenis are unable to produce or buy the food they need, according to preliminary findings of a United Nations survey, which was issued on Wednesday.
					The survey said that the number of people experiencing severe food insecurity has nearly doubled since 2009.

articles.title: Judiciary Chief Strongly Rejects Ahmed Shahid's Report on Iran
articles.content:
Judiciary Chief Strongly Rejects Ahmed Shahid's Report on Iran
Tehran, March 17 (KCNA) -- Head of Judiciary Ayatollah Sadeq Amoli Larijani on Wednesday strongly rejected a report on Iran's human rights by Ahmed Shahid as another scandal for the western governments. 
					He said that the report on human rights in Iran released by UN human rights rapporteur Ahmed Shahid is 'totally unfounded and full of lies.
					
					He said in a meeting with senior officials of the Judiciary that currently, the human rights have been degraded in the western communities to the extent that the people of the entire world know that the western governments do not respect human rights. 
					
					Unfortunately, the western governments, especially the US are using the human rights as a pressure lever against independent states, he said.

articles.title: Anti-Afghan War Atmosphere Mounts in UK
articles.content:
Anti-Afghan War Atmosphere Mounts in UK
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Anti-Afghan War voices are growing louder among the British people.
					According to the survey released by UK on March 13, 73 percent of respondents expressed their opinion that it was impossible to get any fruit in Afghan War.
					
					And 55 percent called for withdrawing British soldiers from Afghanistan at once.

articles.title: OECD Unemployment Rate
articles.content:
OECD Unemployment Rate
Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- In general, around 44.8 million people were unemployed across the members of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD) in January 2012,
					The figure was released by the organization on March 13 quoting the survey data.

articles.title: ACNC ratifica derecho de la RPDC a lanzar "Kwangmyongsong-3"
articles.content:
ACNC ratifica derecho de la RPDC a lanzar "Kwangmyongsong-3"
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se escuchan unos chismes en algunas partes en cuanto al lanzamiento del satelite de observacion de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3", hecho con las tecnologias y fuerzas propias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC como Estados Unidos, Japon y el Sur de Corea critican ese proyecto espacial describiendolo como "lanzamiento de misil", "grave acto provocativo que amenaza la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico" y "violacion de la ´resolucion´ del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU".
					
					A adelantar la conclusion, esos dichos parten del sucio intento de atentar la soberania de la RPDC rehusando su derecho a explotar y usar el espacio con fines pacificos, siendo una expresion tipica de la politica para aplastarla.
					
					Ese derecho legitimo es reconocido internacionalmente y lo comparten todos los Estados soberanos.
					
					Especificamente, el lanzamiento de satelites para la investigacion cientifica y el desarrollo economico no es un privilegio de algunos paises.
					
					En la epoca actual de ciencias y tecnologias de punta, numerosos paises y regiones del orbe profundizan los estudios sobre el espacio y aplican activamente sus exitos.
					
					Se afianza cada dia mas la tendencia internacional a fabricar y lanzar el satelite artificial.
					
					Como hemos anunciado esta vez, el "Kwangmyongsong-3", a ser lanzado en abril proximo, es un fruto valioso de la investigacion cientifica que realizaron nuestros cientificos y tecnicos con el proposito de desarrollar y usar los satelites artificiales de usos practicos, imprescindibles para el desarrollo de economia nacional, en virtud de la politica del gobierno de la RPDC sobre el desarrollo y uso pacifico del cosmos.
					
					Cuando lanzo anteriormente 2 satelites artificiales, nuestro pais observo plenamente las correspondientes normas y costumbres internacionales.
					
					Hemos informado a las organizaciones internacionales correspondientes los datos necesarios, observando las normas y tramites internacionales, y declarado la voluntad de invitar a los especialistas y periodistas extranjeros al lugar de lanzamiento. 
					
					Sin embargo, las fuerzas hostiles vuelven a criticar al unisono nuestro justo proyecto espacial, lo cual tiene la finalidad de provocar a la RPDC y perturbar la paz en virtud de su politica hostil.
					
					EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea no tienen justificacion ni cara para hacerlo.
					
					En el cosmos vuelan muchos satelites de EE.UU. que se dedican al espionaje sobre otros Estados soberanos.
					
					Japon aprieta los pasos para establecer un sistema independiente de espionaje en el espacio al lanzar sus propios satelites espias, partiendo de su anejada ambicion de convertirse en una potencia militar.
					
					El Sur de Corea tambien trato en dos ocasiones de poner en orbita su satelite artificial usando las plataformas de otros paises.
					
					La postura digna y gallarda y el desarrollo cientifico de la RPDC representan una espina atravesada en la garganta para las fuerzas hostiles que cuestionan obstinadamente solo el lanzamiento de satelites artificiales de la RPDC describiendolo como "amenaza de misiles" y "provocacion".
					
					Evidentemente dicho, no se puede tolerar en ningun caso la pauta de doble rasero en la fabricacion y lanzamiento de satelites artificiales.
					
					Estarian muy equivocados si ellos piensan en que la RPDC retirara su plan de lanzamiento de "Kwangmyongsong-3" por las criticas ajenas.
					
					Es injustificable el sucio intento de tomar ese tema como pretexto de presion politico-militar y economica contra la RPDC.
					
					Nadie tiene derecho de censurar el lanzamiento de "Kwangmyongsong-3".
